content: **this is a pay what you want pattern use the code goodvibes50 for 50% off the original price or use the code goodvibes100 for a free copy thank you for your support elevate your home décor with the good vibes coaster crochet pattern featuring delightful bobbles and a delicate picot edge perfect for both beginners and seasoned crafters this easy-to-follow pattern adds a touch of whimsy to your coffee table while protecting surfaces from spills with vibrant or muted colors these coasters radiate positivity and make wonderful gifts or a lovely addition to your own collection grab your yarn and hook and create some cozy handmade beauty that spreads good vibes this pattern is made in dk weight yarn with a 4 5mm hook i think a synthetic or plant fiber is best for a coaster as you will want it to be easy care this coaster is worked in the round in double_crochet st you work increases every round and on the last two rnds you add a few decorative touches the second to last round is composed of bobbles and the last round is a picot edging gauge is not crucial in such a small piece this pattern is written for one size which should be a perfect fit for most mugs if you find that it is too small/too large for your mug i encourage you to experiment with another gauge or the number of increase rnds this is a beginner friendly pattern it uses basic stitches and includes a photo tutorial at the end of the written instructions there are also links to video tutorials for all the special techniques thank you for choosing my pattern i hope you enjoyed it you may sell as many of the finished items as you wish but if you share on social media please give me credit @stopitharry on ravelry and link the pattern to its source if you have any questions or need pattern support please contact me @stopitharry on ravelry i appreciate your support a huge thank you to all my amazing testers coffeebuddy /people/coffeebuddy fizzlllll /people/fizzlllll panacheplus
